name: Trapped (itch) (V1bhav20)
description:
Have fun solving riddles in order to find the way out of the room, whilst also having to fight enemies and be wary of traps! 

If the entire game isn't visible, hold cntrl and use the scroll wheel to zoom out or in.

Controls:

Left : A

Right: D

Jump: Space bar

Shoot: left click

Aim: Mouse

Reload: R
